quiz.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a competition or game in which people have to answer questions
quiz.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: a love quiz in a magazine
I get fed up with television quiz shows.
a quiz night held in the local pub
quiz.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a short test that a teacher gives to a class
quiz.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to ask someone a lot of questions
quiz.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: Four men have been quizzed about the murder, but no one has yet been charged.
They quizzed me on my involvement in the scheme.
